locale.message: Identification Codes Import/Export Plugin
Import and export of identification codes.
Import
Check
Export
Results
Identification codes
The code values for the following ONIX code types are exported (select code types in the settings of the plugin):

You did not select any ONIX codes types that match the code types in the ONIX code list. Go to the settings of this plugin to select code types, go to file 'ONIX_BookProduct_CodeLists.xsd' (List5) to view all ONIX code types available.
Settings for the Identification Codes Plugin
Settings for Identification Code Plugin saved.
Settings
Identification codes to be listed
(separate by commas, e.g. 'ISBN-10, ISBN-13')

Please select an csv-file to upload and press "Start Upload". When the upload has completed, press "Check" to check which entries would be imported or press "Import" to import the data. See example file "example.csv".
To export the identification codes click on 'OK'.
Display codes in the export tab of this plugin
